title: Lim Jing Yu
text:
Hi, I‚Äôm Jing Yu! I‚Äôm a university student with a zest for life, balancing academics with my passions. Let me share a bit about who I am:




üí™ Fitness Enthusiast: The gym and running track are my sanctuaries. Staying fit keeps me energized and ready to take on challenges.
üåç Traveler & Nature Lover: Exploring new destinations and immersing in nature bring me peace and joy. They‚Äôre my escape from the hustle of university life.
üï∞ Living in the Present: I‚Äôm on a journey to embrace the now, letting go of the past and not worrying too much about the future.







I thrive on pushing my limits, whether it‚Äôs achieving a personal best at the gym or running through scenic routes. Fitness fuels my body and mind.



From lush forests to tranquil beaches, nature‚Äôs beauty inspires me. Traveling helps me recharge and creates memories that last a lifetime.






‚ÄúThe best way to predict the future is to create it.‚Äù


‚ú® Thanks for stopping by! Dive into my journey, and let‚Äôs inspire each other to live our best lives!

title: Intern Project in LTA
text: During my internship with the Land Transport Authority (LTA), I had the opportunity to work on several impactful projects utilizing Robotic Process Automation (RPA) with UiPath. These projects were instrumental in streamlining and automating various finance-related processes, leading to significant improvements in efficiency and accuracy.

title: Travel Experiences in Thailand
text:
Welcome to my travel diary! This site documents my incredible journey across Thailand, including vibrant cities and stunning islands.


Hat Yai, known for its bustling markets and cultural charm, was my first stop. Here‚Äôs what I explored:

Kim Yong Market: A paradise for street food lovers with local snacks and souvenirs.
Samila Beach: Famous for the Golden Mermaid statue and serene coastal views.
Floating Market: A vibrant place to enjoy traditional Thai food served from boats.




Krabi stole my heart with its picturesque landscapes and adventures. Highlights included:

Railay Beach: Accessible only by boat, this beach offers dramatic limestone cliffs and turquoise waters.
Island Hopping: The Phi Phi Islands were a standout! I snorkeled in crystal-clear waters, visited Maya Bay (famous from The Beach movie), and relaxed on pristine beaches.






Phi Phi Islands


Experience the beauty of Phi Phi Islands:






Start early to avoid crowds.
Don‚Äôt forget sunscreen and a waterproof bag for your essentials.
Try local seafood on the islands!





Bangkok, the bustling capital, was a mix of modern skyscrapers and historic temples:

Grand Palace: A stunning complex of intricate architecture and the revered Emerald Buddha.
Chatuchak Market: One of the largest markets in the world, where I shopped for unique items and sampled delicious street food.
Asiatique Riverfront: A lively night market with a riverside view, perfect for an evening stroll.




Thailand was an unforgettable blend of cultural heritage, natural beauty, and exciting urban experiences. I highly recommend exploring this beautiful country for its diverse offerings and warm hospitality.

# A simple calculation to check my travel budget
budget <- 1000 # Initial budget in USD
spent <- 750   # Total spent during the trip

Enjoy exploring my travel experiences and planning your own adventures!

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: The GenAI tool I have been using is ChatGPT. This tool has significantly improved my study efficiency by helping me extract key points from lecture slides and organize them into concise notes. Additionally, it has been a valuable resource for understanding complex concepts, such as various data structures and algorithms, that I previously found challenging. The benefits of ChatGPT are extensive, offering quick and tailored explanations that support learning. However, the tool‚Äôs usefulness depends greatly on the user‚Äôs ability to craft precise and effective prompts to retrieve accurate information. This aspect can be challenging for some, as it requires clarity and a good understanding of what is being sought. Despite this, I believe ChatGPT is an exceptional learning aid, especially for tackling complex academic subjects.

title: Intern Project in LTA
text:
Key Contributions:

Data Extraction from PDFs: I developed RPA workflows to automate the extraction of financial data from large volumes of PDF files. This eliminated the need for manual data entry, reducing errors and saving countless hours of work.
Excel Automation: I automated repetitive and time-consuming Excel processes, such as data validation, calculations, and report generation. This enhanced the reliability and speed of financial operations, ensuring timely delivery of reports.
Process Optimization: By analyzing the existing workflows, I identified bottlenecks and implemented automation solutions that streamlined processes, enabling the finance team to focus on higher-value tasks.

title: Intern Project in LTA
text:
Impact of the Automation:

Increased Efficiency: The automated solutions significantly reduced the time required to complete manual tasks.
Enhanced Accuracy: Automation minimized human errors, ensuring consistent and reliable financial data.
Scalability: The RPA solutions were designed to handle increasing volumes of data without additional resource requirements.

This experience not only enhanced my technical skills in UiPath but also deepened my understanding of financial processes and their optimization through technology. It was a rewarding opportunity to contribute to meaningful improvements within a large organization.
